text:
Boy is this a flashback to more simpler times.
I still have this game...and by today's standards it looks like one of those games you play onyour wristwatch. But the only difference was that this game was rad!
Reminds me of when I Iwas six trying this game out in FAO Schwarz at the mall. This thrilled me back then and it still does today. Certainly is a relic of those times that one cannot froget.
